_header: Gabriel from heaven King / Sent to the maid sweet
Subjects: Virgin Mary, Annunciation to; Annunciation, songs of
_description: Canticum de Annunciacione, Latin and English text with musical notes — five 12-line stanzas

BLAru248.First Lines:
Gabriel fram evene kingsent to þe maide
                    swete…
BLAru248.Last Lines:
…him so her for to seruenþat þe us to him
                    take
